## Part 2: Coding Practice 

```{r}
# creating two new vectors ----
vec_a <- c(1,6)
vec_b <- c(2,4)

# checking our by-hand work ----
# a + b 
vec_a + vec_b 

#b - a 
vec_b - vec_a 

# 2a 
vec_a * 2

# a * b 
vec_a %*% vec_b

# It all looks good!
```
